solution.text:
Length of pipe, l \(=_{j}_\)cm
Inner radius of pipe, \(r_1=_{{Fraction(k,2)}}_=_{{k/Decimal(2)}}_\)cm
Outer radius of pipe \(r_2=_{{Fraction(l,2)}}_=_{{l/Decimal(2)}}_\)cm
Total surface area = Inner curved surface area + Outer curved surface area + \(2 \pi (r_2^2-r_1^2)\)
\(=2\pi r_1 h + 2\pi r_2 h + 2 \pi (r_2^2-r_1^2)\)
\(=(2\pi \times _{{k/Decimal(2)}}_ \times _{j}_)+(2\pi \times _{{l/Decimal(2)}}_ \times _{j}_)+(2 \pi (_{{(l/Decimal(2))}}_^2-_{{(k/Decimal(2))}}_^2))\)
\(=_{{trunc((2*pi_val*(k/Decimal(2))*j),3)}}_+_{{trunc((2*pi_val*(l/Decimal(2))*j),3)}}_+_{{trunc((2*pi_val*(((l/Decimal(2))**2)-((k/Decimal(2))**2))),3)}}_\)
\(=_{{(trunc((2*pi_val*(k/Decimal(2))*j)+(2*pi_val*(l/Decimal(2))*j)+(2*pi_val*(((l/Decimal(2))**2)-((k/Decimal(2))**2))),3))}}_cm^2\)
